attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
being an mp should be a calling
with no perks! 
you are serving your country 
take away any issue of expenses

(COME ON GORDON BE A MAN!
Nobody pays me for going to work.)

If you have to travel along way to do the job you want then you should consider that before you choose it.

I fully understand that MPs must be payed a fair wage to make it possible for ANYONE to become an MP.

but lets face it, which working class person would want to be a Mp when they have no faith in the system.

Sometimes you need to suffer to show you want to be something.

I think this is only fair.

if you agree then sign

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
